backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing file, folder, mission, and user profile management with authorization, metadata storage, and diagnostic/health queries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI layering requirement for multi‑select mode and listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of concise summaries for major frontend TypeScript/React files, describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing Draft baseline v114 with verification steps, parity checks, and core behavior validation.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: Defines the main HTML shell with PWA metadata, icons, and bootstraps the React app.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑freeze notice after restoring Live v114, outlining prohibited actions and required user approval for modifications.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and behavior for MyGallery.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing minimal precaching, runtime caching, and network‑first strategies.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying that the frontend matches Live v114, covering authentication, UI components, styling, and utilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper setting up theming, context providers, and intro‑screen logic based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component showing detailed actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and collapsible technical info.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: Renders an animated SVG gallery icon with hover effects and layered rings.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Displays a fixed subtle horizontal decorative line near the bottom of the screen.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a file cannot open in a new window, offering retry or download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Dialog for previewing files with support for images, videos, PDFs, Office docs, downloads, external open, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file and link uploads with progress tracking, validation, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders UI with a styled folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog supporting creation, renaming, deletion, and selection.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen folder manager enabling creation, editing, deletion, and folder selection.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with swipe navigation, deletion, download, sharing, and folder/mission actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Implements a gallery view with file cards, touch long‑press selection, previews, and dialogs for moving, sending, or opening files.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top app header with theme toggle, auth menu, progress bar, and app title.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Displays a short animated splash screen that fades out and triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Shows a dialog when a link cannot be opened, offering retry or copy-to-clipboard options.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login button for Internet Identity showing loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission editor with tasks, file viewer, progress calculation, and mission update/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating new missions, allowing title entry and task management.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view, with hover animations and optional disabled state.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen view for listing missions, handling selection, creation, deletion, and navigation to mission details with swipe actions.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that displays children inside a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files to a mission, listing missions and executing the move with feedback.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files to folders or returning them to the main collection, handling folder list and mutations.
Component enabling swipe-to-reveal edit and delete actions with gesture handling and controlled open state.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Shows a unified upload progress bar when uploads are active.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Intro screen with target graphic and login button for onboarding.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retry logic, error handling, and identity changes via context.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Tracks upload batches, progress updates, and completion with throttled rendering through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer like touch input.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Defines mission-related React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting missions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future notes-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for files and folders, including fetch, create, and upload-related operations with concurrency limiting.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining extensive light and dark mode CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page managing authentication state, folders, missions UI, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers and constants for classifying and messaging actor initialization and canister errors.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Functions to safely open external URLs and download files with popup-block detection.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Rules determining whether files open in-app, preview, or download based on MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Utilities to categorize files by MIME type and provide previewability and human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty placeholder file for notes time utilities.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Lightweight opt-in performance diagnostics with timing helpers for async operations.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Developer tools for inspecting React Query cache and logging mission deletion lifecycle.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs a multi-step smoke test that creates and verifies folders, missions, and file uploads using backend APIs.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Implements a simple promise concurrency limiter with a queue and a factory function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Canonical file list representing the complete verified frontend structure for Live version 114.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for gallery bulk action bar behavior.
